term.title: photolysis

item.text: The cleavage of one or more covalent bonds in a molecular entity resulting from absorption of light, or a photochemical process in which such cleavage is an essential part. For example: [image: Not defined] The term is used incorrectly to describe irradiation of a sample, although in the combination flash photolysis this usage is accepted.
